question: What is the purpose of the 'Location' header in an HTTP response?
options: Indicates the URI of a newly created resource
Defines the location of the server
Specifies the MIME type of the response
answer: Indicates the URI of a newly created resource

question: What is rate limiting in APIs?
options: Limiting the number of requests a user can make to the API
Limiting the size of the response body
Limiting the number of users that can access the API
Limiting the time to process requests
answer: Limiting the number of requests a user can make to the API
